name: Minotaur (itch) (Luna File Games)
description:
"Daedalus has finished his collection of changing labyrinths, designed to contain the many Minotaurs in the land. Great! No one wants to fight a Minotaur anyway.

Wait, your friends don't think you can survive being in the labyrinth? How dare they! We'll show them!"

Enter into the Minotaur's labyrinth and see how far you can get before being brutally murdered. Find the game too easy or too hard? Adjust your Minotaur in Game Modes. Confused by the controls/objective? Try to understand the handy Help menu graphic. It has a 50/50 chance of increasing or decreasing your understanding.

Thank you for considering playing my game. If you run into any problems or have any critiques, please let me know!

Now go run through some hazardous mazes!
